fullText: [1] Gorgias Press offers over 60 titles in the field of Syriac studies, including references, monographs, texts and translations, and books of interest to the general reader. [2] For a complete catalogue, visit www.gorgiaspress.com , or write to Gorgias Press, 46 Orris Ave., Piscataway, NJ 08854, Tel. 732-699-0343, Fax. 732-699-0342, E-mail: info@gorgiaspress.com .
title: Gorgias Press Offers Over 60 Titles in Syriac Studies
Hugoye: Journal of Syriac Studies
author: Kiraz, George A.
displayTitleEnglish: Gorgias Press Offers Over 60 Titles in Syriac Studies
